name: 林正平
objective: This course will provide students with the management fundamental skills necessary to plan strategic management to enhance the performance of construction management. This course explains construction project management introduction, applications and methodologies, research methods and strategic for construction management, construction management important topics, and engineering practical experience. Students can understand construction management concepts and case studies in practice. The major content includes project management research methods, quality management, risk management, value engineering, productivity analysis, contract management, disputes management, and other construction project management topics.
schedule:
1. Basic Concept for Project Management in Construction
2. Main Topics for Project Management in Construction
4. Research methods for Project Management in Construction
5. Strategic Management for Project Management in Construction
6. International Construction Management Projects
7. Special Topics for Project Management in Construction
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance and class participation (10%)
2. Homework (20%)
2. Mid project presentation (10%) and final project report (20%)
3. Final project presentation (10%) and final project report (30%)
